name: Sky Combat (itch) (Necrozplayz)
description:
Just a regular Platformer but more tighter and and harder!

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Left click to shoot

Credits Music

 In game music - HeatleyBros

 Main Menu Music - HeatleyBros

Art

Game Background - edermunizz

Enemy art - o_lobster

Rest of the things are done by Necrozplayz

Game by Necrozplayz.

Thanks to Infinity2456 for test playing my game and UnknownUltima.

Additional Note

It is recommended to not use fullscreen mode for this game.
